page.title: 13GARAGES & PETROL STATIONS
page.content:
In Hodnet there are four garages or petrol stations:
1.{Hodnet Service Station}run by Mr. & Mrs. Van-Rossem. They sell ESSO Petrol service & repair cars and sell Auto spares, sweets, cigarettes, ice cream, soft drinks etc. They provide a taxi service & school bus operation. 2.{Hodnet Post Office}run by Mrs. S. Sargeant This garage sells B.P.Petrol runs a Taxi & Mini-bus service & in the Post Office she sells stationery, sweets etc., & there are full Post Office services. 3.{C.M. Pryce,}Drayton Road. Charlie repairs and services cars. Second hand cars are also for sale. 4.{Brian Nixon,} at Stoke on Tern.{ This garage sells second hand cars and provides a servicing facility. A.A.B.
